national_indicator_description: Infant mortality rate characterizes the number of death cases of children under one year of age over the specified year.
computation_definitions: The indicator defines the mortality ratio of children under one year of age.
computation_calculations: The indicator is calculated as the ratio of recorded infant deaths over the specified year per 1000 live births of the same year.
comments_limitations: Source: records of Civil Status Acts on deaths under one year of age.
